attributes.action: Home office to open an immediate public inquiry into GROOMING GANGS in  the uk
attributes.additional_details:
Because the people of this country deserve to know the whole truth and nothing but the truth.
The victims deserve to be fully compensated for the evil crimes committed against them. 
And the people in power and law enforcement and social care need to be brought to account for any wrong doing or cover up , for what ever reason , personal , political or social .
And for all findings to be made public with immediate affect.
attributes.background: Prosecution and deportation of all foreign nationals involved in. Prosecute all citizens involved  in covering up any wrong doing .Prosecution of all political officials, social care  officials and law enforcement officials who helped felicitate in the cover up and protection of anyone culpable

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for a similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/711976
